name: Apple I
faction: Deceased (died 1979), was of the Apple Family
character_details: She is depicted as a young hippy woman in her late teens or early twenties, with long brown hair decorated with flowers, green eyes, patchy earth-colored clothing, and wood paraphernalia. Apple I-tan is considered the de-facto mother of the entire Apple Family, despite the fact that the Macintosh and OSX lines are not directly related to the original Apple computer line.
